类 LocationController

    • com.qrpokemon.qrpokemon.controllers.LocationController
  • 所有已实现的接口:

extends java.lang.Object
implements com.google.android.gms.maps.OnMapReadyCallback, android.location.LocationListener

    • 方法详细资料

      • getInstance

        public static LocationController getInstance()

      • run

        public void run​(android.content.Context contextActivity,
                @Nullable
                com.google.android.gms.maps.SupportMapFragment supportMapFragmentActivity,
                android.location.LocationManager locationManager,
                com.google.android.gms.location.FusedLocationProviderClient fusedLocationProviderClientActivity,
                @Nullable
                java.util.List<java.util.Map> qrList)
        Checks location permission and opens google map If permission is invalid, will ask user for location permission
        参数:
        contextActivity - Activity whichever calls it
        supportMapFragmentActivity - Activity whichever supports map
        locationManager - Location manager that handles location info
        fusedLocationProviderClientActivity - Client that access location
        qrList - a list of qrcode will be displayed on map can be null for no qr code

      • run

        public void run​(android.content.Context contextActivity,
                @Nullable
                com.google.android.gms.maps.SupportMapFragment supportMapFragmentActivity,
                android.location.LocationManager locationManager,
                com.google.android.gms.location.FusedLocationProviderClient fusedLocationProviderClientActivity)

      • getCurrentLocation

        public void getCurrentLocation()
        Check permission for device, ask permission from user if not given. Get current location of the device

      • onMapReady

        public void onMapReady​(@NonNull
                       com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap googleMap)
        A callback function, triggered once SupportMapFragment gets declared It set the focus of view to current location
        指定者:
        onMapReady 在接口中 com.google.android.gms.maps.OnMapReadyCallback
        参数:
        googleMap - Google map object

      • onLocationChanged

        public void onLocationChanged​(@NonNull
                              android.location.Location location)
        Update location once GPS has responded to request
        指定者:
        onLocationChanged 在接口中 android.location.LocationListener
        参数:
        location - Location object contains location info for current GPS location.

      • returnLocation

        public android.location.Location returnLocation()
        A getter method to return current location
        返回:
        a Location object with Latitude and Longitude data of current user.

      • getCity

        public java.lang.String getCity​(android.content.Context context)
        A getter method for city details of current Location
        参数:
        context - Activity which calls LocationController
        返回:
        A string represents City name

      • saveLocation

        public void saveLocation​(java.lang.String cityName,
                         java.lang.String coordinate,
                         android.content.Context context,
                         java.lang.String qrhash)
        Save qrcode by cityName/regionName Create a new city if city has no qrcode before City stores an HashMap Location Coordinate, arrayList of qrCodes
        参数:
        cityName - city Name player is currently at
        coordinate - coordinate of location, in formation 'latitude, Longitude'
        context - Activity calls it, mostly QrScannedActivity
        qrhash - qrHashCode that is passed in

      • getAllLocation

        public void getAllLocation​(DatabaseCallback databaseCallback,
                           java.util.List<java.util.Map> temp)
        Get all location data from LocationIndex collection on Firestore
        参数:
        databaseCallback - callback function once it retries all info from Firestore
        temp - a List(Map) that contains all location info found on Firestore
